summary: Website for real estate business "PBR Projects" using provided logo, featuring Residential/Commercial options, location listings (Kochi, Trivandrum, Calicut), sample project listings, and an enquiry form.
architectural_notes: Ensure the provided logo asset is correctly referenced and rendered in the header/footer (verify import/path, build bundling, and add a fallback/alt).
known_issues: Logo is not being displayed on the site (likely broken asset reference or bundling issue).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Gold-and-charcoal "PBR Projects" logo mark on a white background (pbr-projects-logo.dim_800x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for the real estate business named “PBR Projects” and use the uploaded logo image as the site brand mark in the header and footer.
Implement a clear navigation and browsing UI that provides property category options “Residential” and “Commercial” and allows users to browse projects by those categories.
Add location options “Kochi”, “Trivandrum”, and “Calicut” and allow users to filter/browse the project list by these locations.
Create a “Projects” section/page that lists a few sample projects with basic fields sufficient for browsing (at minimum: project name, category, location, short description).
Add an enquiry form that collects lead details and submits them to the backend for storage, showing an in-UI success/failure state after submission.

Apply a cohesive visual theme appropriate for a real estate brand, aligning with the uploaded logo styling; use a warm neutral palette (e.g., gold/bronze accents, charcoal text, light backgrounds), consistent typography, and clean card-based layout across all sections.

Fix the site branding logo so it reliably displays in both the header and footer using the user-provided logo image, ensuring the referenced path `/assets/brand/pbr-projects-logo.png` resolves correctly in production builds.
Update the homepage hero (top section) headline to prominently display the text "PBR Projects" in large letters, while keeping supporting tagline copy below it (English).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for real estate business named "PBR Projects" (use attached logo/branding).
Add property category navigation/options: Residential and Commercial.
Add location options/listings: Kochi, Trivandrum, Calicut (for browsing/filtering projects).
Display a few sample real estate projects on the site.
Include an enquiry form for user leads.
Implement backend Motoko APIs and stable storage for enquiries, including a create endpoint used by the frontend (and optionally a list endpoint for debugging during development).
Make the homepage show a large, prominent 'PBR Projects' title/hero heading.
